name: Winx Club: Your Magic Universe
summary: Winx Club: Your Magic Universe turns the users DS into a comprehensive diary/organizer, that is packed with fun sub-games ad Winx Club secrets and information. Using the Enchantix characters form the third series of Winx Club, the easy-to-use organizer means users will never miss a birthday or important date ever again, and can access their complete friends list at the press of a button. Information on friends and personal information can also be stored, while the denizens of the Winx Club universe, their magical and amazing skills, are ever-present in the DS titles menus and entertaining sub-games.
